name: webhook-contract-ci
description: A GitHub Action + CLI to **prevent webhook payload changes from breaking production**.

scripts.build:dist: npm run build && npm run bundle
scripts.demo:ok: npm run build && node dist/cli.js diff --base examples/schema.json --next examples/payload.json --show-nonbreaking
scripts.demo:breaking: npm run build && node dist/cli.js diff --base examples/schema.json --next examples/payload-breaking.json --show-nonbreaking
scripts.demo:breaking:json: npm run build && node dist/cli.js diff --base examples/schema.json --next examples/payload-breaking.json --show-nonbreaking --json
scripts.demo:ok:action: npm run build:dist && node dist/bundle/cli.cjs diff --base examples/schema.json --next examples/payload.json --show-nonbreaking
